intro: Ruschia duthieae, commonly known as the Duthie's Ruschia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. This species is characterized by its succulent, fleshy leaves and produces small, star-shaped flowers in shades of yellow and orange. It thrives in well-drained, sandy soils and requires full sun to partial shade. Ruschia duthieae is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive appearance and drought tolerance.
